Question: In 2009, this person played chef Julia Child in Nora Ephron's Julie & Julia, co-starring Amy Adams and Stanley Tucci.
Hints: Among several notable acting awards, this person won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance.
This person later received her 16th Oscar nomination for Julie & Julia.
Upon her return, this person found that Cazale's illness had progressed, and she nursed him until his death on March 12, 1978.
